p: Firstly, China’s new identity construction with the climate leadership as its key feature will continue to constrain and reshape China’s regional, interregional and global behaviours. China’s high-profile interregional ‘Belt and Road’ initiative will be reviewed and assessed by the world in terms of its impacts on climate change. In order to gain wide participation and support, China has to put climate change into serious consideration in the projects of the ‘Belt and Road’ initiative.
